entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
